item.title: Sevenarches
item.description:
#crits #crits #crits








Northern eastern edge of the wild wood
Skill1
Char

Nature (check the tree)
Nishara and Dao both fail!
Arcana or Occultism
Pandora #crits successes, and finds that the elves came upon the Thin Lord /w distaste and locked him away.
Finds a Pathfinder Chronicles talking about the first worlds; The Thin Lands is synchronized with a Scary Forest ruled by Ranalc, one of the fey gods. He disappeared, no one longer exists

Survival
Gub #crits! /w survival

Gub #crits succeeds! 2 IP + Pandora's 1 IP
Hatria Pebbleworth's body found south of Seven Arches, sure she was killed by goreghasts.
The Mule's corpse was killed /w claws or slashing weapons /w no shadows, and goreghast tracks
Alongside the tracks, shoeless humanoid footprints w/o toes

item.title: Skywatch
item.description:
Built on an ancient Ley Line









Lore for talking to ppl?
Dao essoteric lore!
City's fleet was intact when they got there. Very odd!
Diplomacy
Gub, Nishara, Pandora
Wolves stress, all the houses had everything in them.
Populace disappeared three months ago and left in a hurry. No signs of force, except the sometimesfire. No one left via the river and gates.
Intimidation

Astronomy Lore
Nishara
Everyone's facing the Aiudara
Something was ripped off the top of the Aiudara
Elven Devices have some kinda Chevron which was destroyed after the ppl left. It needs this guide device.
Society or Occultism
Dao and Pandora
This is a Ley Line Nexus! The Architecture of is responsible for the town's shifting nature.
Perception or Arcana
Gub
A lot of ppl came through here a while ago! The whole population?

item.title: Ulikuq
Session 0 (2024-08-31)
item.description:
We set up our characters and learned some basics!


None! first session


Cubes/Amanda, she/her, playing
Pandora, Automaton!
Dynamite, they/them, playing
Dao! human summoner and eidolon Xu Zhu (shu jzoo?)
Highest ping, lol.
Lumenaire: they/he, playing
Nishara, human kineticist
Kinetic aura: a slightly moist, warm breeze
Kel: he/him (me, playing Gub)
Doc doesn't hide rolls or change results. Good luck!
Starts /w 15gp
Focus is a per-combat resource for wizards, spend focus to cast focus spells, refocus to regain them
Downtime: can do w/e, GM doesn't control time. Rare!
Exploration: 10min increments, one room = 10 mins
Climb: Fall/5/10
LOTS OF DAMAGE, don't fall
Aid action: Declare on your turn, DC-5, to try the same roll

item.title: Session 1 (2024-08-31) beginner box start
item.description:
#crits

We started the Beginners Box, tested out some mechanics, killed some rats.




Into the basement, move around, rats appear!
Pandora Inspires and explodes a rat with her needle darts.
Rats attack, do some damage and run up. Gub rages and misses big :(
Make skill checks to get down the cave wall, and investigate mushrooms.
Into the spider cave! Pandora and Nishara sneak across, Dao falls straight in, the spider's strikes and take a huge chunk out of him!
Gub charges ahead and #crits splatters the spider.
We find a hidden passage and pass the check to open it up, a path leads down to a mausoleum!
All the coffins stink like death. Dao opens the biggest crypt and all the coffins explode with skeletons and zombies!
A skeleton comes at Gub and does some damage, the party cleans them up and gets some loot.
We continue on and see some lizardmen working to open a door.
We investigate a side room, find a statue to the god of survival, the chalice is a test.
Drink for CON check, gained Ocean's Might, passed the test of inner strength from Gozera!
The Kobolds in the next room wanted hats out of the locked room, mentioned The Trapmaster and a Capitalist Statue.

item.title: Session 2 (2023-09-14)
item.description:
#trap #trap #trap #crits

We solved a puzzle, killed some kobolds, and encountered some mysterious magical orbs.




9/14/2023 8:30 PM
Dynamite recaps, we're back in Time mode. We walk into the next small hallway, and Gub doesn't notice the #trap! Pandora
Two statues facing an old man, the lord of capitalism, Abadar
In my hands I judge the value of all wealth rasing up all others
Nine coins, one traitor. Three and three, no difference. Two of the last three, left hand is lighter. It's a traitor to civilization! The statute closes its hand and it turns to ash, we get the remaining coins.
Secret room has a symbol of Abadar, lots of gears and things! Crafting check to find the purpose, or open the valut. It's a #trap control console, goes to a different room, currently disarmed. Small vault of treasure. There's kobolds in the next room. Nishara stays behind to pull the lever, and we barge in, and roll garbage initiative!

A kobold swings at Dao and dips
the trapmaster hits Dao with a javelin
Gub runs forward and smacks him in the head, avoiding a #trap!
Dao walks forward and tries to demoralize.
Another kobold comes around and sets Gub up for flanking /w Trapmaster
Pandora Cubes walks forwards and Demoralizes Trapmaster
Nishars walks forward and casts Four Winds! We all get a free move, gub moves around!
Another kobold runs up and flanks Gub again! He swipes and does some damage!
Trapmaster goes off, hits for damage and wiffs twice
Nishara pulled the lever, and vaporizes a kobold! She runs ahead and vaprorizes a kobold with elemental blast
Trapmaster whiffs against Gub and tries to run away! He doesn't get far.
Gub closes distance and…. Also whiffs.
Dao reloads and Thinks, gets the killing blow!
Trapmaster mentions about a Green God (powerful character)
We rest and heal, Dao Quick Tincture

We head Downstairs 40ft or so, it's slimy! Enter into a room with rough defenses
Gub notices nothing, and a Kobold pops up!
Kobold was Hidden: makes an attack and attackee counts as Off-Guard. Gub gets machine gunned!

Pandora needledarts the kobold good!
Nishara FourWinds ppl out into the room, peeps a Kobold, but it's still Hidden from us
Dao maneuvers into position and THINKS!
Gub Hides, Doesn't see Kobold, Seeks the Statue has Mechanical Joints
Kobold goes, ignores Gub for Nishara, does some damage
Nishara strides over and misses with an electric strike.
Dao does some damage
Gub runs up and smashes!
North wall has some kind of hidden barricade, Dao tries to Craft it away and it crumbles, opening a new splitting passage ahead, it's stinky.
We walk ahead and encounter some slimes? Speaking Aklo, subterranean language!
NOT SLIMES, Dao talks to them! We are indeed not fishlike! Pandora plays CHUD Shanty and #crits! They respected Pandora's bass drop and converse. Dao is able to talk, one was lost to the south, a green ball,  another to the Mermaid room, which is beautiful and deadly. The Green God is a creature that the Kobold Leader, has wings and acidddddd
They leave! There's a thin wall at the top, we could push through it.
Dao can hear Kobolds through there.
Orbs in the room! Brown earth and stone, Glass and clouds, Roaring Flame. They're clearly elemental conduits. Dao and Nishara advance into the room, and a big Fire Rat pops out of the red orb

item.title: Session 3 (2023-09-21)
item.description:
#COMBAT #trap #combat

We waded through a sea of kobolds and conquered Zolgran the conquerer




9/21/2023 8:32 PM
Luminaire recaps! We beat the statute, then we dealt with the Trapmaster for his bad fashion sense. Gub got shot by kobolds! We played Darude Sandstorm and made friends with the stinky watergoblins

Dao and Gub run up, the rat has noxious fumes!
The rat bites Gub and Dao, sets Gub on fire!
Gub misses big. We eventually kill the rat!
"Call upon the wind to gain my blessing and soar through the sky"
Grinding voice: "call upon the the earth to gain its might and fury"
Gub is granted Elemental Aid of the Earth Itself! Spend an action to add +2 damage
Trap Hazard! A #trap that acts in combat
We work on the statue, pick some of the consoles, and smash the other and the statue itself!
Gub got rager and smashed it.
We try to surprise our way through the wall to the north, but Gub doesn't do well :\
We start

with many kobolds, the party is split.
The kobolds trip and tumble around
Zolgran the conquer, fed fish they steel, a sign of future conquests
You can do one rest per day
We fight Zolgran the conquerer and his two minions, Gub gets in and smashes good

item.title: Session 4 (2023-09-28) gatewalker start
item.description:
#COMBAT

We killed the dragon at the end of the Beginner's Box and began to Walk Gate!




9/28/2023 8:38 PM
Cubes recaps, we do recall knowledges on Dragons. Gub remembers nothing. Nishara and Pandora also dunno!
Dao knows all! The dragon is green for sure and enraged by red capes, definitely.
Pandora full sends across the map and attracts a green dragon, The Preacher! a horse sized dragon, smelling of bleach


Dragon breathes so much chlorine gasssssss and drops Pandora. Gub runs and battle medicines Pandora back up, the dragon wiffs against Gub, and flies away!
Dao finds no weaknesses, and moves. Nishara tickles the dragon with some elements.
Dragon breathes chlorine and barely hits Pandora.
Gub smashes good and tries to Grab but trips instead.
Dao kills it!

You should be able to answer the following questions tomorrow night:
Who is your character?
Gub, orc warrior
What did you see in the Aiudara that made you walk into the shining portal that fateful night?
eye-you-DARA
The fight of his life! But then, the journey towards it!
Why did you answer Dr. Ritalson's call for Gatewalkers, and how did you find yourself fast-friends with the rest of the party?
Dr. Ritalson's purple headveins

The carriage enters a place, calm guards, stream, caravan, Ritalson's (ustelavian alchemist) put out a call, a search for answers
Thousands entered the gates, 30 returned, with a mark!
Sevenarches run by druids, oversee the area, an affliction hits the elfs that approach the gates. BUT since the missing moment, the curse has vanished aver 700 years???
Dubious Knowledge by Dao, heard rumors of fey creatures, normally oak stewards
Dr. Ritalson leads the horses forward. He's pretty old. He yawns and lets us go, we're the best field researchers!
What happened to the thousands who didn't return? We've looked everywhere, in every library and tome. Quest is deeply personal, he gives his most promising lead. Sevenarches! The turn-to-ash curse was lifed the Missing Moment. Study the aiudara in person, and meet Fianara Caralestri, she's over there and covered in scrolls.
No other place in the world has this many aiudara, elf teleportation gates
Where'd they go? Elven dark realms where they come from.
Obnubilate Curse. Elves fall unconscious, shrivel, forget themselves, scream, turn to ash.
9/28/2023 10:14 PM

Dr's Power: his big veins turn into eyeballs so he can read lots
Can we talk to the elves? NO. They turn the forest against you and then kill you.
Dr: meet me back in Lepinshctat. Not many secure communications.
Meet Fianara, she'll help /w extra help, she's an elf! Needs help getting into SevenArches past the oakstewards and shadow creatures. Actually named for Tourist Decoys! Paper Mache!
She pulls out a bong /w wires, an aura recorder it'll record a agate's magic signature. Go to the tourist trpa and stick your hand through.
There's alarmed guards and a velvet rope, but those gates didn't open! They're fake!
9/28/2023 10:27 PM

Fiarana hands the bong to Nishara, and a disguise kit. Don't litter around the Oakstewards! They'll mostly try to cast you off
We're three miles outside the city. Nishara keeps the hat of disguise.
9/28/2023 10:37 PM

The fashion police head into the city!
The wendmore and fogmore creek meet. Buildings on the outskirts are newer, outside of a nest of vinewalls that tie themselves around like mortar
Reach the gate entrance. The Oakstewards are here, vine armor and weapons, magic flowers
Two Stewards, gate guards. Pandora rolls perform to distract, Nishara sneaks right past.
Gub unsuccessfully sells the "Statue" to an old man, as she blasts beats
Repurposed archetecture, some human additions vines cover everything, everything is built around the park
We check out arches, 20feet tall 10feet wall, energies impressive, vines and trees surrounding.
A podium and businesses aruond, a large croud. An Oak Steward at the entrance. Many Arch-related businesses. NOON IN GAME.
We fuss around the arches, visit Golden Arches
Dao remembers their Ghost Hand power and hovers the bong in the arch while Pandora performs a distraction!

item.title: Session 5 (2023-10-05)
item.description:
#dream #COMBAT #crits #COMBAT

We meet the Oakstewards, navigate the city to key locations, learn about Sevenarches from a gnome, learn about Bolan Nagrasaro's rebellion, and begin hunting him down in the Wilewood and retrieving his key. We thwart a dark ritual with a Unicorn and successfully capture a steward for interrogation.




We killed the dragon at the end of the Beginner's Box and began to Walk Gate!



Oakstewards mostly checking ppl going in, ez to leave
Head to the Justice House, mb function outside Oakstewards, but deferential. We wait in line and pay 1gp.
The Wicker House/Vinehall, capital of the Sevenarches, mb an old manor, covered in living vines, OakSteward central, need a writ to go in. 
Find a gnome to tell us about the city, he says the arches are fake, turns ppl to squirrels
Quaking Stacks = ancient elven books library, gnome friend got caught stealing, kicked out
Thornleaf Barrack = underbrush, oaksteward armory
Tannery = don't use animal leather! Wink wink
Silver & Cold = coinage and weapons

Cabaret = fey themed. sometimes host fights
Gnome leaves, followed by squirrels
Travel back to the Caravan Suraih and Fianara, it's about 4pm
Glowing purple orb, no other bulb lit, all Illusion magic, no extraplanar anything. Since we did this she'll offer info: the real seven arches aren't in Seven Arches. The real Arches are in the Wilewood. The stewards move them during the . Seven Guards also disappeared, ONE CAME BACK, was jacked up, sickly. Btaken to vine counsel, got a fine for shirking duties during the Missing Moment. He killed one stole an artefact (very powerful) and rode out on a thorntide. Now he leads a rebellion in the security corridor.
We have an inn room! Her contact gave her a bark writ and a letter of introduction. Writ guarantees a mid-tier Steward lady who's agreeable. Artefact has something to do with our powers.
"Take this, go to the vinehall and meet Lemma Feldthorn (watch out for her horse)"
Dao, Pandora, Gub, find a caravan leader, Nishara finds another guy.
The Wood is about 50miles, two day ride, largest forest in 7A. Pretty dangerous, creepy, fey attacks recently.
Approaching the gate, Bark Writ lets us back past the gates. Nishara dons the Magic Hidey Hat, and we enter the Vinehall. A Big Flower scans our Writ and summons Lemma Feldthorn through a wall, she also has a full size Clydesdale, who eyeballs us narrowly. She takes the Writ and talks straight through the building, vines receding around her, we follow her to her terraced office overlooking the town. Mulberry the Horse is still warry of us. We hand over the intro letter and she frowns and set it aside
Bolan Nagrasaro was the guard who came back and stole the artefact. Stewards stretched thin. Pressure from the north now that the curse is gone. Rebellion to the south /w Bolan. He stole the key to the Gates. Stewards sent a spy who came back w/ bad news.
Get Bollen and the Key back to the Justice Hall.
Can give access to a Caravan and a Writ through their controlled areas and to the Wood.  The Real Seven Arches are at the Wilewood, a ritual is happening there later the week COUNTDOWN!
Return Bolan alive if possible, offers 30gp, half up front. We each get a Writ to the rest of the country.
Potency Rune, +1 To Hit, 35gp
Striking Rune, +1 Damage Die, 65gp
GUB GETS BOTH!!!  And now needs access to magical damage.
We swing by the tannery; it's a front! The Caravan is well appointed, spartan, led by two horses, and head out. A Steward gives us maps and directions and shows us where the Real Seven Arches is.
Pass farms run by Leshy (plant creatures), Stewards help farmers. Gub uses Express Rider to gain 1.5 speed, we'll arrive during the day. The road gets worse and the forest gets spoopy.
As we sleep, we #dream! Dao saw something /w his brother, and sees a family scene /w their brother and walk through the blood red portal! A wide chasm, an empty pit but not empty, on a mountain sits a figure in a coat, a mask of flesh and fur and horns Horned One, staring with sorrow and hatred. Something in the Pit Whispers.
We wake to Dao's sigil glowing, ghostly hands breaking trees and shit, bust up the caravan. About a minute later, Dao awakens a power! Ghost Hand Push, handprints everywhere!
Morning: Breakfast and heading out. Get close but have to ditch the cart for the overgrowth and bad road.
Spooky forest, even in the day.
A clearing! A Huge Stone Arch 50ft tall. Six other arches around.  Some activity in the arches, doing….something. Shouting? The lights dim as we approach, but the whole party has dark or low light vision and we arrived during the day.  Gub seems wisps of black smoke by a bush which explodes…..with activity!


Gub runs up, finds gross smoke dogs, and #crits, pasting one! The superpowered Maul works!
The dog Temygir jumps through Gub's shadow over to Dao and bites Dao!
Pandora Inspires and NeedleDarts.
Dao doesn't get much info and swings and wiffs.
Nishara opens her elementa gate channeling elements, killing the second! 15xp
COMBAT ENDS
Nishara remembers what they are: Temegir, personified fear from the First World (of the fey), made of the Fear of Being Stalked in the Night.  If they kill you they eat your shadow!
Small break for healing and sneak forward, finding a shadowy line around the arches, everything inside looks like charcoal drawings. A ShadowShift Field!  It transports you to the Fae world, can be suppressed for an hour by bending the field to your will. Nishara does so and wills the ritual to fade for one hour. 15xp!
The ppl in the arches (200ft away) don't yet notice.
They're carving stuff into the ground, some kind of bundle in the middle /w torches around. Mb luggage?  We try to sneak up but everyone sees Gub! They chant primal words, their weapons glow and grow! One throws a gust of wind, the sheet blows off revealing a Unicorn stabbed and getting ready to sacrifice!


Gub rolls poorly!
Unicorn cries!
Pandora Inspires and darts a guy.
Nishara uses Four Winds, we get a free mini move! And electocutes a Bad Steward
Dao Strides and Stabs, dropping a Bad Steward! Exploits Vulnerability on them.
A Bad Warden runs forward and whiffs against Gub! Twice!
The Second runs for Flanking, and hits Gub, right in the ass!
Gub pastes that Bad Steward, the second gives up.
The Unicorn explodes out and charges through Dao!
Pandora heals the Unicorn to sooth its wounds, the knives falling out, then a tiny sunflower falls out, shrieking! The unicorn runs off and the sunflower seed dies. 60xp for freeing the Unicorn and killing the guy.
Nature could soothe the beast, or healing.  Healing killed the sunflower seed thing!
What tales will this captured oak steward tell??? Will the Unicorn return with loot? Next time, on Gatewalkers!

item.title: Session 6 (2023-10-12)
item.description:
#COMBAT #COMBAT #crits #crits #crits #trap #COMBAT #COMBAT

We fight our way through the Rebel Oakstewards treetower (and meet some fun Leshi) on our way to Bolan Nagrasaro. We learn about Bolan's ritual to restore nature's balance /w the Obnubilate Curse!




Dynamite Recaps!
Last of the Rebel Oakstewards remains. The weird sunflower seed has melted.
Dao! Give us Nature,
Mb an artificial Leshi? Tastes nasty.
"One of Bolen's things" says the ritualistic sacrifices, Korrian
Says he's gonna leave and give up this life. He's very nervous.
What was this ritual for?
Bolan Nagrasaro whispered to the walls in his room, gave then the unicorn, then sacrifice it tonight to bring back the Obnubilate Curse. Said it was the way to restore the balance of nature? Extend the curse to others and bring down civilization. Found an abandoned commune /w blood n script. It's a tree commune. Bolan Nagrasaro got paranoid, grew thorns on all the tree and lubed 'em up. Gives a map to Gub, path winds back through the forest, or can follow the unicorn blood.
Just one entrance, can walk right up on in, they only put the barricade up /w Bolan comes out of his room.
We send Korrian on his way and try to heal up.
We make it through the forest and find a commune of tree houses connected by rope bridges. South end: Big towertree + gazebo Northern end, and a big windmill.
Four total connected buildings.
Wooden staircase winds up 40ft to a pillbox with murderholes. A figure gazes to the west, we're coming from the south.
Try to stealth? Bumrush the stairs?
We dick around and get discovered!
Menelimus shows /w heavy crossbow, we run up! There's two Rebel Oakstewards and a snake


Dao starts! Exploits weakness on Snake Steward.
Pandora runs in and Inspires, Frightens the snake.
Snake runs in and misses dao
Snake Steward melds his snake in and attacks Dao, who retailates /w his amulet
Rebel Steward moves and damages Dao /w a staff
Gub rages, sees Spirits all around us, splats steward
Someone kills Snake.
Dao enters the room to the north, finds a critter and triggers a tripwire, dumping caltrops in his space.
A Vexgit, likes lostening bolts or removing nails and causes trouble
Pandora makes an impression, plays metal.
"we tear this room up when he's in his room"
We enter the Kitchen, it's Sweltering! Massive stove, with two lil creatures eating cupcakes
Dao recalls knowledge, they're definitely fay.
We enter and Pandora makes an entrance. They point and scream that we're trying to steal their sugar
 They're enraged Melixie!


Pandora runs in and darts, #crits and the fay leaks bees
Fae runs in and Quickens. Pandora tries to Eerie Flicker but #crits fails and Frightens herself!
Nishara #crits Wind Blasts it into confetti sprinkles!
Fae 2 Quickens and runs into Pandora's space, crits /w Stinger
Dao kills Fae 2
COMBAT ENDS
Pandora triggers an exploding Stove #trap, which KOs Pandora.
We try to heal back up, /w Treat Wounds and
Move into a ransacked larder /w a basket + winch system
South to the musical instrument room, we get ambushed by some pixie creatures!

They're 15 feet up, Dao chakrams!
Nishara lightnings one almost to death!
Fae 1 throws lil sparks at Dao, misses and crit misses
Gub rages, sees a band of small figures eating and making merry
Dao thinks! Fae are weak to Cold Iron, he second-chakrams the second
We continue to the south, there's a ladder up in the center of the room
Dao gets flasks of acid to the face so we try the other door and meet plant ppl Leshis
They came after the gnomes, invited by Bolon, leave now that the guards are dead
Dao takes the Basket Winch up into a rainwater collection system atop the windmill, while the rest of the party enters a mostly-twigs broom. Dao returns to the party, and Pandora steps out into Combat, one of the Rebel Oakstewards nods in acceptance of combat!

A tiny fox appears and tries to bite Pandora and does!
Nishara fails to Seek the fox, moves up, balms Pandora
Oak Steward fires at Pandora /w a shitty cold ray.
Pandora hits the Steward /w Needle Darts
Dao moves up and Seeks
Gub rages! Spirits are having a picnic, kids playing, also a Stick Figure
Gub finishes the fox off and moves up
Nishara moves up and Lightnings the Steward to death.

item.title: Session 7 (2023-10-19)
item.description:
#COMBAT #crits #COMBAT #trap #Investigation #crits #crits #crits

We wrap up the rest of the Rebel Oakstewards and Bolan Nagrasaro, watch the Shadewither Key get snatched up by Kaneepo, and began an Investigation of Sevenarches




Try to cross the bridge, it falls! Gub leaps back to safety, we head down to the plant room to climb the broken bridge parts.
Gub clambers on up, and bursts in! It's an alchemy lab, there's the guy who dropped acid on us. Also two spiders, and
Also one of the Rebel Oakstewards!



Dao first, they're right behind Gub and can
Gub rages, sees small ghostly gnome alchemy, a good joyous time! A thin black entity checks them out
The rest of the team #crits and clears up the spiders
It's a repourposed library. We loot some potions
We bust through into the north room, beds with gnome corpses, they're moldy and bloated.
We try to open the door to the north, there's these whispering guys. The room is very cold. The humanoid figure turns around and his leshi sunflower perks up


The sunflower explodes, and starts charging up. Dao moves forwards and kills it!
Bolan Nagrasaro thorns Dao, slams his staff down sending his skin across the floor
Gub rages, sees the dark one, moves up and reflexes through Bolan's thornskin
Pandora inspires, and misses /w Needle Darts
Dao throws their Chakram, killing Bolan Nagrasaro!
The dark figure takes something bright from Bolan, who shouts "Kaneepo don't forsake me!" as his body turns into a tree of human flesh.
Nishara balms Bolan to keep him. "Kaneepo hunts your dreams, takes your children, the Fey Lord of the Thin Lands!"
Bolan Nagrasaro was an instrument, Kaneepo made the curse, and he's back to make it STRONGER.
Kaneepo took the Shadewither Keyyyyyyyy
We head to the last room, it's the top of the windmill. Dao triggers an explosion #trap and we run away instead of Thievering it

Bolan Nagrasaro met Kaneepo here, and he was there ever since. We read his journal.
Thin Lands are part of the wild wood, closer to Seven Arches, farming community, unnaturally fertile.
Kaneepo promised Bolan an end to civilization, bring it down, "bring the key to kaneepo and he'll craft a better curse"
Gub awakens a power! In white fur and black horns Horned One, brilliant blue eyes, angry and disappointed "Gub, what have you done!"
We reach the outskirts of Sevenarches, fires and destruction all around, missing limbs. Heading to the Vinehall, Lemma Feldthorn and Mullberry outside, giving orders. We head inside the Vinehall. Goreghasts: Bolan was offered a goreghast army!
Lemma says we can check
The Thin Lands (northern eastern edge of the wild wood),
the Quaking Stacks,
or a survivor of the attack,
or the gorghast attack scene

Rules:
One day to investigate a site: travel there, investigate, return to camp.
Travelling together = more throough investigation
Compare notes at the end of the day for Investigation Points
Locations require skill checks
We Home Base at the Honeybrush Cabaret!
Gub and Pandora sleep on the floor, the others rent rooms

Gub and Pandora head to the Goreghast Attack Scene
Gub #crits!
Hatria Pebbleworth's body found south of Seven Arches, sure she was killed by goreghasts.
The Mule's corpse was killed /w claws or slashing weapons /w no shadows, and goreghast tracks
Alongside the tracks, shoeless humanoid footprints w/o toes
Dao and Nishara go to The Quaking Stacks
The building is grown much like the vinehall, a sentient tree /w knowledge in its sap
Both use Nature and fail, spend 8h doing it wrong!
Nishara has a bed next a window, sees an odd figure in the alley, it's thin, white like bone, but wet. She finds a stickfigure on a page that morning, woke up found drawing of that figure

Gub and Dao to the farm, A Survivor of The Attack
Gub #crits! /w survival
Fey creatures stalking the land, Alderwoman of the Thin Lands Abalina Choy
The Shadows in The Thin Lands shimmier like shadows of Goregas
It's not just Goregas, there's a history of youths walking out into the forest.
Nishara and Pandora go back to The Quaking Stacks
Pandora #crits successes, and finds that the elves came upon the Thin Lord /w distaste and locked him away.
Finds a Pathfinder Chronicles talking about the first worlds; The Thin Lands is synchronized with a Scary Forest ruled by Ranalc, one of the fey gods. He disappeared, no one longer exists

item.title: Session 8 (2023-10-26)
item.description:
#COMBAT #crits #crits #INVESTIGATION #COMBAT #COMBAT

We get ambushed by Temygir, and continue our Investigation. We find our way towards The Thin Lands and Kaneepo's Court!




New Rules
Dying is tougher
Recall Knowledge is negotiable
Battle /w the Shadow Dogs / Temygir!

Gub goes first, splats the high init Temygir by Nishara.
Pandora Inspires and Demoralizes a dog, success
Scared Dog bites at Dao, needs a Fort save failed :( another five damage as it bites into Dao's shadow
Next dog bites Gub, #crits! And then a miss.
Dao is Prone, mb Delay? No! Stand up instead! Gets critted.
Gub #crits kills the dog in front of him, moves and almost kills the dog that big Dao.
Pandora inspires and Needle Darts the last dog :) but Dao's still dying!
Dao fails their dying roll, ruh row, then Pandora dumps the rest of her heals to bring the party back up.

Dao is now an Investigator, we all head to the survivor of the attack:
Pa, Hable Moesby, ambushed two days before after selling turnips. Dogs murdered his mule and ran back.
He seems traumatized! Says he was attacked by a shadowdog, saw the Thin Man /w too many teeth! Felt him poking around inside his head, unworthy of procreation
Diplomacy - Nishara failed
Medicine - Pandora Succeed, Dao succeeded
Perception - Gub success
Intimidation
Nine IP total, now!
Chasing Kaneepo the thin Lord of the Thin Lands, attacks on citeznry, villagers, more active since the Missing Moment occurred. Note from the oakstewards. Thin Lands = Forest + Mirrored world. The Dogs attacked from the directions of the thin lands. Pa might be attacked! We rush the caravan to Pa's in the Thin Lands, as we barrel into the field, and shimmering portal opens, a forest in perpetual twilight painted in shadow, a footpath winding ahead.

We leave the caravan with Pa's caretaker and enter the portal: Nishara Dao Gub Pandora
Shadows are everywhere deep and strong, Pandora's song sounds drained. The Portal zips closed behind us.
A path forms ahead, we follow, sometimes seeing a big bird skeleton off in the distance, also laughter at us. Eventually the land caves away and flip up into place, revealing a giant ebony tree, the size of a building, Kaneepo's Court, The Thin Lands!
Huge roots, an ornate wooden door /w a paper lantern



Gub fails a will save and sees this chicken thing, everything starts to warp under its gaze, an Oculai!
Our vision blacks out and we see death!
Gub rages, moves, and wiffs.
Pandora tries to heal, Dao gets up
Chicken stabs Gub, then grabs him
Gub smashes the chicken to death!

Statue of Kaneepo, covered in pearls
Dao notices the pearls look oddly shaped for pearls. Oh, not pearl: teeth
The statues teeth look gold, mb loot? A loot gremlin /w pliers: tooth fairies come pouring out of the walls


Pandora Inspires, Darts
Tooth Fairy swarms over Nishara and Dao
Dao devises a strategem, free RK and shoots
Nishara lightnings them
Gub rages (seeing a ton of small figures underneath, the children) moves and smashes good!
Pandora moves and tries to demoralize them, failing.
The Swarm flies over Gub and down to Pandora
Dao swings at the swarm and devises a great strat
Nishara misses makes it and lightnings the swarm to death, exploding into white powder!
Everyone but Nishara gets Sicken +1
Open the door to a large dining room, kitchen /w human meat, heavily armed and shielded Centaurwoman standing at the head of the table, invites us in. Her green cloak sometimes snags a piece of food and eats it

item.title: Session 9 (2023-11-16)
item.description:
#COMBAT #crits #crits #crits #COMBAT #COMBAT

We battle a centaurwoman and her minions in Kaneepo's Court. We explore a hall with portraits detailing Kaneepo's dark history and powers. An artist studio reveals a haunting painting of us under Kaneepo's influence, and we kill a magic insect, The Chronicler, leading us to a library with collector tomes. A surgical theatre presents a Japanese knife ghost, which Dao tactically evades! Our investigation hints at paintings with sinister abilities.




We get ambushed by Temygir, and continue our Investigation. We find our way towards The Thin Lands and Kaneepo's Court!



Remaster has happened! Not much updated for us, tbh
Tougher dying rules got re-interpreted, it's not as lethal now.
Kel recaps.
Centaurwoman gorging herself on the remains of gnomes, humans, elves, etc. Her cape eats too. 1ft razorblade flesh orb watches her happily. A kitchen full of more meats off to the side. The ceilings of these rooms goes off to forever. She's eating, will deal /w us later when she's done. Dao fails to recall knowledge, Pandora performs and impresses her, she's hungry for Pandora flesh.
We line up and begin

when she finishes eating and fires off

Centaurwoman rolls high, runs up to Pandora and takes a bite.
Nishara shoots water at the wirebladehook servitor, at the end of her turn it retaliates by detaching its blades and attacking, Nishara resists /w Will
Orb retracts its orbs and chainsaws into Gub, Nishara, Gub, and Pandora. It then frightens Nishara.
Pandora strides away, Inspires, and fails to Demoralize. Pandora stops bleeding!
Dao Devises a Stratagem on the lil guy. It's a Velstrack, too cool for Hell. This is an Augur. Dao shoots and #crits, it dies! It drops and squishes like a sponge.

Gub's turn, he moves, smashes her good, and trips the centaurlady.
Centaurwoman gets up, hoofs Gub, and raises her shield
Nishara shoots, misses, and misses again.
The Orb regenerates, gets up, and chainsaws Dao, Nishara, and Gub (Gub spends a hero point 1 to 20, #crits success)
Pandora #crits the Orb, Anthems
Dao Recalls Knowledge
Gub rages up, fixes his grip, and Smashes her dead with a mighty roll!
Nishara Readies an action to blast the Orb, and does when the Orb gets up!
Pandora kills it with Silver Darts, and we heal up
We mostly fail but Dao identifies the Cloak of Gnawing Leaves
One of the two doors to the north are locked, Dao tries to pick but fails, Gub rips the door open
It's a hall /w ten live portraits, an exit to the far north. These are big paintings, a baroque rennaisance scene /w gross teeth and bone, a gallery of his life story.

A child fully born fully formed /w black eyes is born into darkness looking for friends
A dark cloaked figure /w horns Horned One, Kaneepo kneels and gets petted bizarrely touchingly
It's Count Ranalc King and Father of the Night Hold, long vanished fey god. No one will speak of his treachery.
No one speaks of his treachery.
Kaneepo loitering /w other fae, he's staring at their Shadows and feasting on them
Kaneepo gets baned for all eternity
Kaneepo finds the Seven Arches. Striding through, he meets cruel gross elves, he tries to make friends but they attack him
Kaneepo eats all their shadows, the image reverses. He's mutilating elves, their blood flows into the tree. He's making the Obnubilate Curse!
A group of Elven heroes beat him through the Seven Arches and the Night Hold to the Tree Stump we're in.
Kaneepo sits for millenia in a cage, his blood pooling into the room
Kaneepo breaks free of his prison, hunts down and slay the descendants, retrieve the key, and weaves a great curse from the corpses. The curse flows like a river of death.  He outlived his captor's magic as he grew and matured.
Kaneepo sits on a throne of elf skulls
Exit to the north into an artist studio, a painting in the middle of the room is leaking blood. Nishara runs up and takes off the tarp!
A boney hand takes the tarp off. It's Kaneepo's throne, with all of us wearing his smile.
Gub notices a stash in the art supplies. Bioluminescence Bombs!
A door to the east explodes as a magic insect dude blasts in and initiates combat! He's glowing with scintillating lines.


Pandora Anthems, Needle Darts
The creature's body quickens, it runs up and strikes twice! A fortunate crit /w a low damage roll. It screams and detonates in color! Fort saves. Gub crit successes, Dao and Nishara are dazzled! Everything is concealed for a round. Pandora got nailed by light.
Dao devises a strategy but pivots to moving and Battle Medicining Nishara
Gub Rages, moves, and misses :(
Nishara balms herself and tries to attack the Bug.
Pandora Anthems, moves and tries to demoralize the Bug, failing :(
Bug moves and doublehits Nishara. Nishara flickers, gaining consealment, which ruins its next attack!
Dao Thinks about it, it's a Dizurak, a termite from the plane of shadow, a lady, Dao shoots and hits! Glowing ichor oozes out like glowstick fluid.
Gub stides, Smashes, and Smashes again.
It was The Chronicler, a Librarian :(
Into the library to the east, we find some collector tomes among the many books.
Pandora opens the door to a surgical theatre covered in geometric grooves for collecting blood. A japanese knife ghost attacks Dao; I'll stop this choice! She's really hazy (concealed?)


Dao thinks about it, fails, pivots to run back and closes the door, leaving the ghost on the other side.

Combat ends!
We're in a bedroom, portrait of slender figures. Pandora and Gub are approached by Nishara and Dao with the Slender Smile. Gub tries to turn it around, but the painting bleeds through to the other side.  We try to identify a figuring in the bedroom, it's a Wondrous Figurine of Onyx Dog
Dao's second lead: The ghost woman!
The paintings can animate, and bleed through to the other side, mb be interacted /w?

item.title: Session 10 (2023-11-23)
item.description:
#COMBAT #COMBAT #LEVEL

We encounter traps and a knife ghost in Kaneepo's lab, leading to a battle with a ghost and the Look-see Man. After dealing with them, we explore Kaneepo's cell, uncovering mystical sigils and confronting Kaneepo himself along with his shadow dog. Despite Kaneepo's efforts, we kick his ass, learn hints about our powers, and escape the dungeon, following the Shadewither Key to a shadow version of the Seven Arches. Entering a portal, we're transported through an Aiudara to a...jungle? The gate platform has evidence of dragons. We level up!




We battle a centaurwoman and her minions in Kaneepo's Court. We explore a hall with portraits detailing Kaneepo's dark history and powers. An artist studio reveals a haunting painting of us under Kaneepo's influence, and we kill a magic insect, The Chronicler, leading us to a library with collector tomes. A surgical theatre presents a Japanese knife ghost, which Dao tactically evades! Our investigation hints at paintings with sinister abilities.



Dynamite recaps!
Mist fills the room, seeping out of the skulls, we notice what's probably a trap:

Pandora finds a chest! Gub finds a skull near a door, it has an eyeball that jets away as it notices us
Dao opens a door to a large workroom with tables and reagents, two amber pods like coccoons. A tree grows between them.  This is something Kaneepoo used to experiment on elves.  The double doors to the north are ornately carved
As Dao takes reagents from the chest


The knife ghost lady crits Gub, who backs out and closes the door. Oof down to 2hp
Nishara notices a weird dude with goggles hanging from the wall
The Ghost flies through the goddamn door!
Gub rages, misses big and runs away!
The spiderguy magic missiles Dao and Shields up
Pandora demoralizes the Ghost, and tries to demoralize the Spiderman
Dao runs away and Treats Wounds on Gub for a massive 20 healing!
Nishara runs up to Spiderman, infuses her weapon, and misses.
GhostLady coalesces out of mist and fires void energy at Dao
Gub move and smashes the GhostLady good, vitality damage blasting her to bits
Spiderman casts fire magic at Nishara and runs for cover
Pandora misses some Needle Darts but keeps her Anthem going
Dao thinks well! and stabs the Ghost to death, she was a Shay, a wispy state of flux, can't cast shadows of her own
Pro-creation! Can swip-swap faces around?
The Look-See Man! He created the Pro-Creator
Gub sees a pitch black room, painted walls or covered /w soot. Dao sees mystic sigils on the floor, mb use Acrobatics or Thievery to move around the room, or dispel magic. Dao carves them out /w Thievery over 30 mins while Nishara balms herself up and Gub. The sigils disappear. The cell is overlaid /w fae words. Kaneepo's cell, where he was ripped apart forever.
Back to the goretable room: remove the paneling and find a mass of cockroaches that die to a torch.
A living throne of wood and skulls, a black silk bed, and this dude in a cave: Hubert Hedge

Paintings everywhere depicting withering away. Kaneepo speaks in our heads, knows we are unwilling


The shadow dog leaps through Pandora's shadow and misses an attack
Pandora tries to attack the dog, Nishara does too
Gub moves up and big whiffs
Kaneepo moves and shoots a line of shadow corpses across Gub Dao and Nishara. Gub uses his last hero point
The shadows hit Dao and Nishara; Gub's shadows fight it off.
Dao thinks well, move up, and shoots at Kaneepo, doing some damage
The dog misses pandora twice, and does some piercing damage to Pandora's shadow
Pandora steps away from the dog, Anthems, and tries to demoralize kaneepo, but he's immune to fear!
Nishara shoots at the dog, missing twice
Gub rages, and Titan Swings at Kaneepo. A Mighty Crit! 60 damage, 2d6 bleed! Kaneepo shrieks!
Kaneepo runs and tries to hit Nishara and Pandora in his shadow line attack. They pass but the dog fails! Kaneepo bleeds and heals it.
Dao shoots the dog, another crit!
The dog moves to Pandora, fails to bite, and eats Pandora's shadow
Pandora steps away and spends a hero point to crit on the dog!
Nishara moves up and Crits Kaneepo to death! Kaneepo said he knows who powers our sigils, but dies before he can reveal anything.
We release Hubert Hedge and escape as this tree dungeon and through the dark shifting Night Hold, following the Shadewither Key. It leads us to the shadow version of the seven arches! The key and the arches harmonize as the arch illuminates and a portal opens. Huburt jumps through, and we follow!
Pandora has her flashback, about the height of the Jiskan empire. She now finds herself in a sea of automatons
The Dragon's Gate
The portal closes after we go through, and the key dims. We're hit by a wave of heat and humidity, we're in a jungle!
Gub and Dao notice a large set of claws marks. They're probably from a pretty mature dragon, not long ago. Gub thinks we're sitting on a dragon's resting plinth, and the dragon was recently here!
#LEVEL UP TO 3!
Gub takes Toughness, and increases Athletics to Expert
Pandora takes Assurance for Performance

item.title: Session 11 (2023-11-30)
item.description:
#COMBAT #crits #COMBAT #COMBAT #COMBAT

We explore a jungle, spotting pyramid structures and encountering exotic creatures, including a tree fisher and a snail-ipede. Crossing a rust-red river, we fight off amphibious threats. Reaching a hilltop, we engage in combat with catlike creatures near an ancient elven statue. Taking a gondola, we're attacked by pterodactyls but manage to reach a pyramid city where a crowd of Elves awaits us!




We encounter traps and a knife ghost in Kaneepo's lab, leading to a battle with a ghost and the Look-see Man. After dealing with them, we explore Kaneepo's cell, uncovering mystical sigils and confronting Kaneepo himself along with his shadow dog. Despite Kaneepo's efforts, we kick his ass, learn hints about our powers, and escape the dungeon, following the Shadewither Key to a shadow version of the Seven Arches. Entering a portal, we're transported through an Aiudara to a...jungle? The gate platform has evidence of dragons. We level up!



Lum recaps!
Anathema and Edicts now available in Foundry
Dao sets up new Leads since Kaneepo is dead.
Nishara doesn't know which plane we're on; we all roll either Survival or Nature. Pandora Palms and flora and fauna def not of Seven Arches, Shadewither Key, which share the same shape as the leaves around here. There's a hill nearby and we head towards it.
Ape noises and echoes as we head to the top of the hill, 20min walk. Emerald green westward, two POIs:
Mountain range, miles away, pyramid structures on the slopes
Gleaming purple ropes connect the pyramids to the hill, large platforms suspended like gondolas carrying cargo from the hills, returning empty. Lots of other buildings, substantial settlement. 
The air is rich and velvety, we head off towards the base of the village. Gub does great at Sense Direction.
A hydra-like centipede eats a racoon /w four arms. A light mist but no rain, monke howls intensify. Death from the trees!
Some kind of bonemouse comes down, Gub notices a hideous monkey scorpion thing in the tree


Gub seeks and rages, Nishara pops the bonemouse. Pandora tries to seek but fails.
The monke shoots a scorpion tail, the filaments hook into Gub's flesh! Grabbed and bleeding.
Dao shoots and make it bleed green blood
Gub hits and #crits it to death, and we leave and run away, looting the monkey (Tree Fisher) corpse with some filament and a gland.
We've made it about a mile, and now hear the sound of running water. Dao swears another centipede hydra, now eating a pillbug; that's def the same centipede
We come across a rushing river of red water, there's rocks here; this is the easiest place to cross.
We roll Nature and Survival to try crossing.
Dao knows it's rust, not blood. Pandora and Dao notice that lots of wildlife uses these rocks. Pandora finds a set of humanoid footprints heading across to the other side, recently.
We start to cross the river
Pandora jumps on a rock and Dao notices that the river has some other creatures in it!


Out of the water, a massive snail-ipede chameleon thing, it's throat swells and vomits an amoeba at Nishara, and two at Gub.
Gub rages, leaps, and throws a javelin at the snail!
Pandora Inspires and uses Animated Assault
Nishara moves and zaps the snail
Snail files into Gub's rock and smashes him, the amoebas follow suit
Gub hits, and then Crits the snail!
Pandora Inspires, maintains the Assault killing an amoeba, and Demoralizes the Snail!
Dao misses
Nishara lightnings the snail to death!
We take a quick breather and Treat Wounds up, and then continue to the hilltop.
Mossy bolders and a few trees, one boulder carved into the shape of an Elven head


A catlike creature /w frog eggs attacks Gub, screaming and popping a fireball
Gub rages and smashes it to death! He sees spirits around the elven head while raging!
An adult cat runs up and explodes the other three
Nishara balms everyone
The second adult cat bites Nishrara and venomizes her!
We kill the cats w/o too much trouble.
Inspecting the elf statue: it's a full statue, like to the feet, a few hundred years old. We continue to the top of the hill
A quarry, sheer 15ft walls, precisely carved. A 30ft tower with a gondola slowly arriving, about to cycle up.
Rocky constructs are mining away, filling the gondola /w Cargo.  The buttons on the gondola are older Elven. Dao hits the "recall to city" button
The gondola takes off, the mountains and pyramid city to the northwest. Gub see dinosaurs appearing!



Pandora makes an impression while Dao Recalls Knowledge, they're Tyranadons, they can hover on wind currents. These are strange adaptations, and they attack!
Gub delays
Pandora shoots darts at them
Dao thinks and shoots!
Gub prepares an action to smash
Tyranadon flyes past to hit Dao, Gub smashes back
Pandora and Nishara kill the wounded one as the baby runs away.
Dao gets plucked off, but the safety protocol slams them back into the gondola.
We approach the building site. There are many pyramids and completed buildings. A huge….ship? Is inside a dome? Most of the mountains are actually pyramids. A crowd has gathered, they're expecting us!

item.title: Session 12 (2023-12-14)
item.description:
We arrive in Castrovel's pyramid city, Loskialua, greeted by elves and led by A-Lay-Lay to an inn. Benly the errand boy shares local stories, including one about the goddamn psychically enhanced apes!
At night, we're taken to a dome with a huge telescope, meeting Gentheel and the council. Discussing the Missing Moment and the Shadewither Key's curse, we learn it's controlled by a psychic trigger related to Gentheel's mother. Tasked to find her in The Garden, a place for the city's greatest minds, we descend into a cavern and fight Immoles. After defeating them, we discover a room filled with statues in robes.




Cubes recaps!
Platform nears the beginnings of a pyramid city, many in construction. Lots of telescopes, including one huge one!
About 75 various elves in furs and leather, not ostentatious, except for lots of jewelry, each engraved /w symbols, not elven writing or mystical runes.
The elves talk excitedly to us! Gub and Pandora hype the crowd, Nishara and Dao actually talk to them:
They want to know who we are, what we're doing, etc
A woman cuts through the crowd towards us

Everyone has a telescope or binoculars; they're all looking for something, clearly.
She shows us one bright star, a pale blue dot. We're on Castrovel, second planet from the sun the homeworld of the Elves. She leads us through Loskialua to an inn.
She is A-Lay-Lay of the Oatia
The last visitors were a hundred years ago
We're in the middle of nowhere
We came in through a Olde First-World portal
She waves over an elf kid, Benly, our translator for business
They don't get visitors often, everyone will be excited!
Nishara buys a Gate Attenuator (Air)!
We sell off CONSTRUCTION MATERIAL (the gland and the string)
Benly tells a story about the Apes; they were benign but were psychically enhanced
Benly only has six or seven rings, it's a tradition
Mentions the city usually barters and that we're hung up on material stuff
Lights come on at night, and huge plump fireflies gather around
A-Lay-Lay leads us to the dome /w the hugest telescope.
This city is built into the mountains, reverent of nature
Chanting from the big room!
A huge room filled /w astronomical symbols, a variety of people sit on pillows, facing a central figure:

We hear "Dezna" from the people praying; she's a Golarian goddess, aid others, explore, don't cause fear or dispair, don't use magic to corrupt dreams, or being a bigot.
They bring us pillows to sit, as Pandora makes a mighty impression.
Gentheel the Rememberance, and the elected council of Loskialua, we're welcomed!
What brought us here?
We tell the tale, Gub playacts along.
As we talk about the Missing Moment, and that all the Aiudara activated.
They mention Castovel's gates didn't open
The gate we came through hasn't been active in 4000 years
A-Lay-Lay noticed a Galorian gate activate for just a second, a week ago, a few hundred miles north of Seven Arches
The Shadewither Key is an Aiudaran Access Key
A-Lay-Lay touches the key and gets cursed!
Gentheel reads the Key, and Remembers: the curse is Fey, but also has a psychic trigger controlling the curse and preventing it from being released, and it's a memory in this guy's memorybank.
When he tries to remember it only says "O-SOY-O" and ancient dialect of Sovereign that means "whale"
The voice is Gentheel's mother, a previous Rememberance of the town. Why would she censor it?
Go find Gentheel's mother in The Garden!
The mountian range has hosted many civilizations.
Beneath Loskialua is The Garden where the greatest minds go to be laid to rest, preserved by The Gardeners
Few ppl return from The Gardeners, no one has had to ask in forever
Ask to speak with Askar-eal
We're lead out of the city and to the entrance to a cave.
30 feet down a passage, then a very steep set of stairs down for like 45 minutes like a mile into the mountain
A cave carved /w leaveless treetrunks that looks like the Library Tree from Seven Arches
Into a cavern hundreds of feet high, walls covered in plant life. Ambushed by weird mole creatures!

Dao inits great, devises a good strategm, and recalls that these are Immoles, and Dao shoots it
Nishara recalls knowledge, it's not weak to anything in particular and has limited uses of it's biggest weapon, and Air Blasts
A mole tries to fire blast all of us and fails
The second mole roasts Gub, misses, and fails to roast Dao
Pandora needle darts a mole for some damage,
Gub rages, sees a procession of spirits, whiffs with the harpoon, and reels it back in
Nishara Air Conditions the party and Conceals us all from their heat vision!
Dao crit fails and is set aflame!
The other one doesn't do much
Pandora anthems and darts
Gub hits a little /w the harpoon
Dao battle medicines and runs to the water to put themselves out, plunging into deep waters
One mole leaves, the other fails to microwave anyone
Pandora anthems and darts
Gub climbs the plants and Trips the mole off the wall to the ground, prone!
Dao swims out and SUPERCRITS the mole to death.
A room of statues of a variety of creatures, all with similar robes.

item.title: Session 13 (2023-12-21)
item.description:
#COMBAT #COMBAT #COMBAT

We confront animated statues in a room of bas-relief figures, battling their psychic attacks with a mix of magic, thievery, and brute force. After defeating them and exploring further, we encounter skeletons armed with ancient weapons, engaging in another combat that we navigate successfully. Discovering a unique crossbow and a special buckler among the ruins, we interact with mushroom leshi, warning us of a snake. Encountering quill snakes, identified as Scale Scribes, we engage in combat, overcoming their poison and magical attacks.




Dozens of bas-relief statues. Some insectoid, rodents, all humanoid and wearing similar robes. Only two are holding books. Four statues activate, eyes glowing!
Carve eyes out? Thievery
Blast statue?


Pandora anthems and tries to blast the statue
The statues fill Dao's mind /w memberances of failing detective work! Dao checks the books for Decipher Writing Arcana
Nishara tries to cross, and is assailed /w failures in the library tree. She also Deciphers the book:
Lo to those who walk the path, beware the scholar's bane
And she blasts the statue too
Gub Rage, move, and smash! Hero point to crit the statue, smashing it. The statue tries to Will save Gub, but 404 Scholar not Found
The Statues go off and Pulse! Dealing a pile of damage to Dao and Nishara
Dao is offered the chance to rebut the doubts! And thieverys the eyes, shutting down a statue, and shoots at another!
Nishara retreats and shoots, damaging a bit more, and retreats.
Gub battle medicines Nishara and smashes the rest of the statues
Bones and rotted armor! That's odd!
Irregular wall, up to the left.
Pandora detects magic!
Some skeletons are fully intact, grasp their weapons and raise with no sound!


Two have skeleton antenna and lances, one is an elf skeleton
Dao moves, thinks, and shoots! Piercing damage doesn't do much to them
Gub rages, moves, and smashes (/w vitality damage!)

item.title: Session 14 (2023-12-28)
item.description:
In a confrontation with quill snakes (Sneks), our group manages to defeat them with strategic attacks, learning the mechanics of aiding each other in battle. After the fight, we exchange significant memories with telepathic entities for passage, leading us to meet Skyseer Oatia amidst magical, cabbage-like growths. Oatia reveals the Osoyo Protocol related to a blackfrost whale (Osoyo!) from the High Houses Era, responsible for a psychic viral extinction. We learn the Shadewither Key contains the Osoyo Virus, an anti-life curse targeting elves, with hints towards a cure involving "agua deific" and advice to consult "She Who Walks Through Seasons." Selfless Son/Sun deity gave themselves up to ensure Osoyo's imprisonment, but the prison is weakening!

Following the summoning, we engage with Kappas near a sacred spring, mistakenly fighting guardians before realizing a peaceful approach was needed. Collecting sacred water, we return to Loskialua where A-Lay-Lay is cured of the Obnubilate Curse with a newly prepared potion. The Shadewither Key reveals a vision of a portal hub to Nishara, hinting at vast knowledge and a connection to other realms. A-Lay-Lay proposes a method to return us home via a portal on Galerion, linked with the Shadewither Key, despite temporal discrepancies suggesting a journey back in time. Abruptly, the environment shifts to Fleshtown (Octurne), challenging the group with its noxious atmosphere and an encounter with a Nightgaunt. The scene transitions yet again to a desolate moon (Chi-ox), where we face a Cairn Wight. The chaotic journey through portals underscores their quest's unpredictability and the vastness of the multiverse.

Cobblestones and storefronts, a one storey wooden building, inscribes /w potions.

Celestia's Palace, finest Textiles
Shining Silver Jewelry
The Apothacarium
Gub sees a flicker of light from the low window. Low groans from the north.
Dao sees a woman in PJs, shivering. They call out, in pain. A man from the south calls out and draws a pickaxe

item.title: Session 21 (2024-02-15)
item.description:
#COMBAT #crits #crits #dream

Our adventurers met Turner Snudes (an intriguing character!) before facing off against Vhisia and her henchmen. Afterwards we stumbled upon Deniigi, an Erutaki tracker and protector, in distress.
Dao (a classic mix of curiosity and bravado) into an alchemist's trap, but found the password to chill out the animated armoire.
A Ley Line Dagron monster presented a formidable challenge, spewing magic energy around. Gub ate a mighty crit, and the party decided to run away at the start of the next session.




En route to the Mystic Market, we encounter Ishalt, a cursed wolf offering Dao a chance to take on his curse. At the Mystic Market, they find signs of struggle and distress among the inhabitants, setting the stage for further exploration and confrontation.




The man, Turner Snudes is joined by A lady (Vhisia) and her compatriots show up too, past the Apothecarium. She's tall!

She welcomes us to the Market, for a fee (10gp per head!)
Turner says he'll join us for 20gp, and she's upset!

Lady casts Phantom Pains at Pandora, and draws a shortsword
Pandora Anthems and Phantom Pains back, but it doesn't work
Bandit runs to gub and does some damage
he's better at hitting enemies that are Frightened (they count as off-guard)
Gub beheads a bandit because it turns out he CAN'T ATTACK THE LADY
Nishara shields and blasts the Lady
Bandit dashes up to Dao, and trips himself
Vhisia tries some stuff and it goes poorly.
Dao #crits and runs away
Gub kills another bandit and can't do shit against her!
Nishara tries to kill her, but she can't!
Vhisia tries to Charm Snudes, but fails! and runs away
Pandora kills her /w Needle Darts
Now Snudes runs the market! We deal with him. Nishara Requests, lowering the price to 10sp each
Dao enters Celestia's Palace, a woman w/o gear, moaning on the ground! He applies an antidote, and she recovers
"Horned One! Where are my friends?"

She's Deniigi, tracker and protector
Gub walks into an intact room, nope he doesn't actually!

Dao walks into the room, the door slams, and Dao fails Password Attempt 1/3 (aubergine)
The armoire cabinet is asking for password.
Dao tries to search and #crits succeeds, finding Fae writing! Shopkeeper was a gnome, put himself into debt to craft an Arcane Guardian; the password is "bobble", and this chest doesn't beat Dao to death!

We trade /w Snude for a Armor rune!
"Common Gub dub"
We head back to the Smiling Wolves camp, rest up, and get some Runes applied.
As we fall asleep, everyone has a restless #dream again, but they're invaded by a Robed Man, it's Dr. Ritalson, he can sense us now that we're back on Golaerion.
Pandora buys a new spell.
We go to check out the...

The stone gates are falling apart, but open. Hobgoblin boot footprints enter the city. Two sets of prints have left. About half a mile outside the city - it's still not daylight
In a small valley half a mile away, a bloody cave!

A loud voice speaks in : "LEAVE LITTLE FLESHLINGS OR BECOME LIKE YOUR BREATHEREN" and this thing walks out

Dao thinks it's resistant to physical damage.
The Dagron glows and breathes in blue glowy, venting it through his body, growing in size. It's eyes flash and an aoe hits us all (ref save), a wave of force 5ft burst

It's using Ley Line energy (which explains Skywatch, if it's sitting on an ancient ley line)
Nishara runs and tries to Cold Blast,
Pandora runs and Anthems
Gub moves up and gets reaction striked
Party decides to ditch!

item.title: Session 22 (2024-02-22)
item.description:
#investigate #investigate #Investigation

Ran away from a Dagron, then back to steal its stuff, then away again while it hurled abuse and promised retaliation. Started to #investigate and learned things about Skywatch. Matz and Sakuachi don't have any more quests for us in Skywatch.




Our adventurers met Turner Snudes (an intriguing character!) before facing off against Vhisia and her henchmen. Afterwards we stumbled upon Deniigi, an Erutaki tracker and protector, in distress.
Dao (a classic mix of curiosity and bravado) into an alchemist's trap, but found the password to chill out the animated armoire.
A Ley Line Dagron monster presented a formidable challenge, spewing magic energy around. Gub ate a mighty crit, and the party decided to run away at the start of the next session.



Dynamite recaps!
Dagron waddles up and strikes Nishara!
Everyone ditches the encounter! 0 xp :(
"I will pursue you once I'm done sleeping this off!"
Pandora spellcaster can find Ley Line energy?
Gub's spirit eyes see listless humanoid figures hovering above the ley line
Pandora can see the nexus of the leyline is under the Observatory
We sneak back and engage the sleeping dragon!
Dao sneaks in and finds some bodies, including a piece of small esoterica!
Gold inked scrolls? Knicknacks?
One of the bodies has Irutaki Garb, and a Smiling Wolves patch, Dao retrieves it!
...and trips, awaking the Dagron! We run away

Rewarded XP for turning in Quest
Gave news of last Erutaki dead by Dagron :(

We've resolved all the Erutaki ppl stuff, and Matz has no more Quests here for us
Sakuachi doesn't know where the Falling Star is???
We #investigate the Smiling Wolves, still no Dagron attack.
THE NEXT MORNING
Pandora checks the Ley Line and finds the Dagron is still hunting....
We head to the Observatory for some more Skywatch #Investigation . Hot rolls!

Under the observatory (by our Bravoy Aiudara) Gub describes as his spirit vision sees into the past:
Huddled ppl marching down the stairs, a Severe woman looks across the crowd and smiles, she wears black and blue leather and bodice, her eyes flash /w a blue pulse. (Ley Line energy?)
Spirit lines overlap in front of the gate under the Observatory. The Woman holds a Device /w the Aqakaru. The woman bows and kneels and heads through the gate. Hordes of ppl follow. Individuals climb up after, and begin beheading the rest.
On the back of her bodice; a stitching of the sky above Skywatch, and a Falling Star?
THE NEXT MORNING
We catch Sakuachi up /w the Lore and make some purchases.
We decide to keep investigating, the Mystic Market and the Guard Post are left.

item.title: Session 23 (2024-29-02)
item.description:
#COMBAT #crits #dream #crits #combat

We gather up the Erutaki and head to the Observatory. We're ambushed by that damn Dagron, but with the help of the Erutaki, it eats shit. A vision at the Aiudara reveals a connection to the Worldwound Scar in Sarkoris, prompting a journey across the Lake of Mists and Veils to the Junlan Wrecks. There, we discover a fine ship The Mermaid's Tears and are ambushed by a Capstan Swabby; combat on this icy vessel!




Ran away from a Dagron, then back to steal its stuff, then away again while it hurled abuse and promised retaliation. Started to #investigate and learned things about Skywatch. Matz and Sakuachi don't have any more quests for us in Skywatch.



Lume recaps!
"Rocks fall everyone dies"
We've been in Skywatch for a week
Recovered all Sakuachi's Erutaki companions
The Smiling Wolves are content /w Plunder
Sakuachi wants to see the Observatory, a building disguised to channel the Ley Line energy
We do so, and get ambushed by the Dagron! It bursts through a building!
Nishara astronomy lores! and we fail, falling into the Dagron's trap. It's guided by Ley Lines


Dagron moves and Frenzies! hits Gub and Dao
Sakuachi Blesses everyone! "Go for the gaps between the scales!"
Pandora Composes, steps, and fails to demoralize
Pandora notices the streets being cold?
Nishara baits out the Reacc Strike, eats a hit
Gub moves around for Flanking, Rages and Hits!
Dao fails to think and Phase Bolts
Dagron roars and chants occult words to the Ley Line, glows blue! and crits Gub /w Fangs
Sakuachi runs and blesses
Deniigi runs and shoots
Pandora anthems and Shields
Ulikuq runs and baits a reacc strike!
Innumma tries to Demoralize the dragon
Nishara notices the chill increase around her, she's got too many shadows?
Gub Titan Swings and #crits
Dao hits, and tries to heal Gub but fails
Dagron tries to smash Gub /w Ley Line Tail, fails, fails to Talon too!
Sakuachi moves into flanking and misses, her light removes Nishara's feeling
as does Deniigi!
Pandora anthems and misses a needle darts and shields
Ulikuq nat 1s :(

Gub hits good, misses, and battle medicines
Dao devises, misses a lightning bomb, and Phase Bolts it
The Dagron runs away!
We've mastered Travel in Skywatch, and reach the Observatory!
Heading back into the excavated hallway and the Aiudara room, with the crowd of bodies facing us, the Gate flickering.
Getting near the gate, Nishara's Astrolabe of the Falling Stars.
A pyramid with stones in the distance, two worn changes, a Black Sun hangs heavy in a ring of fire. Before the pyramid, humanoid bodies appearing to bow. The pyramid flashes like water revealing a huge eye. "Osoyo" echoes in our mind as Sakuachi's light pushes it all back! An Aqakaru in gold, a droplet of sun falls to the Pyramid, (Nishara sees the scene from the portal changes as if a silvery hand pulls the Sun to Galeron.) We've heard tales of this place, the Worldwound Scar in Sarkoris (suffering under Demons), where the abyss took thousands of lives at the death of the demon god Deskari. Metal screeching and a snapping chain; a dark voice shouts "We are Osoyo, we will be free"

The aiudara stabilizes before you. In the shimmering blue of the portal light, you see a great pyramid of pitch-black stone far in the distance, upon which two large silver chains, each looking weak and worn, bind the exterior. Above the pyramid, a black sun hangs heavy in the sky, a ring of fire flickering from its edges like tentacles. The field before the pyramid is host to an uncountable number of humanoid bodies, each kneeling in the snow before the dark structure, appearing to bow to its majesty. The structure’s surface ripples like water, and a great chasm breaks upon it, revealing a massive ice-blue eye shot through with luminous purple veins. The kneeling figures stand, a black mist sloughing off their bodies. "Osoyo" echoes through your minds, and somewhere deep inside, you hear your own voice repeat the call. Sakuachi shines with a golden light in your sight, and it takes an immense amount of control to stop yourself from reaching for her, to stop yourself from snuffing out the hated light. A faint flicker on the surface of the Black Sun shows the Aqakaru, and a golden droplet of fire drips down from it. As it falls, it starts to flare out like a golden star, the light overtaking the pyramid. The scene through the portal changes, and Nishara, it almost seems like there’s a slim ivory hand in the star’s glare, guiding it across the sky of a now familiar landscape. You’re heard tales of this place – seen the illustrations in journals and books. Perhaps you even have been there at some point, although doubtful, as you are all still alive. The falling star burns over the Worldwound Scar, in the demon-haunted wasteland of Sarkoris. Where the Abyss took countless lives, and a decade ago, a group of adventurers, commanders of the Last Crusade, slew the Demon Lord Deskari to stop the endless invasion at the cost of their souls. The sound of metal screaming overtakes your mind. A chain snaps on the black pyramid. The portal light dies off, and the dark voice in your soul screams out in the pain of loss. OSOYO it cries. WE ARE OSOYO. WE WILL BE FREE.
^ The Vision of the Skywatch Aiudara
How do we get to the Worldwound Scar?
It's across the Bravoy Lake
Sakuachi doesn't believe in coincidence, she seems to be filled with glorious purpose!
"we have to make it to Sarkoris! Let's ask Matz Balandim!"
Matz is drinking and sobers up when he hears we we're going to Sarkorus!
NavigatorWolf shows us generally the way across the Lake of Mists and Veils
Head out towards the Ice Rime River, out to the Lake, to a smudge labeled "Junlan Wrecks" a ship graveyard (the ships aren't the only thing that's dead) past Ageddy and Mendev near the Wastelands. Should be able to find a good lakeworthy ship in the Wrecks to the northwest.

it's ez:
1. Find a good ship in a wrecked ship graveyard
2. Navigate your way across a dangerously impassible lake to
3. Get to an earthly hell full of Demons.
Matz gives us a magic staff, a Traveler's Any-Tool!
"Don't even think too hard on the ghost stories about the Junlan Wrecks!"
We head out, it'll take about two days to make it up the River
Limited Downtime Activities, talking about Sakuachi's magic
The power of dreams and vision! The Dream Lands, existing beyond death
We roll Nature and Sailing Lore!
Gub knows nothing
Dao knows it's the largest body of fresh water, hundreds of miles, the Veil of Fog, everyone goes missing
Nishara knows all about the tangle of pirate ships, undead and Fey, and all the rumors are true!
Two days and nights go by, we enter the bay of icy water, a wave of wrecked ships!
Sakuachi looks disturbed, wakes up aghast! Listen for bells and a weeping mermaid! A man, watching me /w a mask of white fur in the edge of her #dream vision now, the Horned One
Through the ice, dozens of monolothic behemoth ships! Gub and the Erutaki icepush through.
Lots of skeletons in ice, but only lil snow tornadoes
Gub #crits good Perception to notice the sound of a woman weeping, Sakuachi demands going towards it
A whole intact ship with a crying halfling mermaid figurehead! It's called The Mermaid's Tears
A gangplank from the boat down to the ice in which it's trapped
Sakuachi leaps to the ice and heads to the ship, as do we all!
A well appointed ship! As we approach the midship, the capstan springs to life!

Capstan Swabby guards the deck! and initiates #combat

item.title: Session 24 (2024-03-07)
item.description:
#crits #crits #crits #crits #crits

We nearly kill Capstan Swabby, but are stopped by the ghost of Captain Adney Tinhill! Explaining his unfinished journey due to Flobius, a Nyad serving the water lord Arangadon, Tinhill proposes a deal to aid in his journey's completion in exchange for dealing with Flobius, who binds him with her magic.
Equipped with darkvision goggles, a serpent dagger, and a map to Flobius's shrine, we set sail, encountering ghostly figures and navigating through a chilling temple marked by a blue oroborus of Ragadahn, the Water Lord. Combat ensues against guardian Dragur and Kvernknurr.




We gather up the Erutaki and head to the Observatory. We're ambushed by that damn Dagron, but with the help of the Erutaki, it eats shit. A vision at the Aiudara reveals a connection to the Worldwound Scar in Sarkoris, prompting a journey across the Lake of Mists and Veils to the Junlan Wrecks. There, we discover a fine ship The Mermaid's Tears and are ambushed by a Capstan Swabby; combat on this icy vessel!



Cubes recaps!

Gub rages! No spiritsight, moves and fails to trip Swabby
Dao #crits Thinking!
Capstan moves and spins anchors everywhere
Nishara throws fire, does a bit of damage
Pandora Composes and Needle Darts
Gub successfully Trips! Misses, then Hits!
Dao moves and Thinks! and hits
Swabby stands up, mechanical arms appear, and it patches itself up! and slams Gub with a crit Anchor smash
Nishara Flamethrowers Swabby
Pandora anthems, and can't Blistering Invective
A ghost man rises out of the ship, stretches, and calls off Capstan Swabby!

"There's no need for this violence! I'm looking for Guests, not Enemies! I'm sorry for that greeting! I'm so sorry! I'm Adney Tinhill, Captain of The Mermaid's Tears"
"I was the best Nissian Pirate Lord I mean ship's captain!"
He was trying to cross the lake during the seasons of mists, stuck in the Wrecks. His soul never found peace, wants to finish his journey. Can't happen while Flobius is here, a disgusting Nyad in a temple, singing songs to her fey lord, Ragadahn, the lord of Water, is her Master.
The Tears is a superior vessel, for a superior traveler! He'll offer a full journey
Flobius' magic keeps Captain here. She dwells in her shrine, made of wrecks of ships she's lured here. If we can deal /w her, she Knows A Ritual. We may have to be diplomatic.
Gub /w Nature learns about Nyads
Nyads protect fresh water, usually solitary, sometimes obecess over
Arangadon, lord of travel, moves around /w shifting form
She possesses a Ritual that'll turn the boat into a Ghost! Could try flattery...?
Adney gives us some treasure, Darkvision Goggles and a Serpent Dagger
Swabby produces a map! The Water Temple is about an hour away by boat. The Erutaki decide to stay on the Tear.

There are ghostly figures on the ships, waving and begging, but we ignore them all.
A dozen shattered hulls and decks held together by skeletons and bent weapons. Ice everywhere.
Many figures mill about the entrance under blue flame

a blue oroborus, the symbol of Ragadon the Water Lord

it tries to speak, but only seawater comes out. Dao gets to RKs Weak reflexes,
Pandora tries to cast Animated Assault and triggers combat!

Dao thinks! and Throws a bomb, and Kills one with a last arrow.
She melts away and curses Dao with an Albatross

Pandroa starts her animated assault
Nishara flanks the moved Lady, and Fire Punches the Ghost.
The GHost's resistant to Fire!
Second ghost moves and whiffs!
Gub Rages, moves up, and kills one
Third ghost lady moves up and swipes everyone!
Dao runs out of Nishara's temperature aura, thinks poorly, and Shoots
It's a Drauger! Risen corpses of dead sailors
Drauger swipes and claws
Pandora kills one, and maps Needle Darts
Nishara whiffs, then one-action blasts the last one apart
Dropping the final guardian, a bell rings. The Orobous shines and the door blasts open!
Silence, then Feminine Singing
Three wide corrodors. If we get away from Nishara's aura, the cold gets crazy
We see these things! But then they disappear
A mountanous pile of bones!
As Dao looks at the water, Jotuns rise up!


It Bellows! We're frightened! It Swallows Dao whole!
We can cut Dao out with certain types of damage?
Dao fails to escape, then #crits does! and gets puked out

Gub rages! A horde of souls are touching the bones. Hits meekly, and doesn't trip.
Gub gets grappled, Swallowed Whole, and it misses a Fist on Nishara
Nishara elementoal swords the one that Swallowed Gub, and 15 damage drops Gub out!
Next one moves and Swallows
Dao thinks
They're Kvernknurr, they gorge themselves on farmers
Pandora coldiron Needledarts! and Gub falls out
Gub trips it, and #crits it to death!
Brother Slayer! Move, fail to Bite, and hits Gub with a fist
Nishara moves into flanking /w Gub, and firey blasts
Third Brother appears! Dao moves, Divises, and minimum damages with a bow
Pandora coldiron Needle Darts the fresh one, and #crits Demoralizes it!
Gub trips Second Brother, #crits Trips him, and sinks to killer map strikes into him!
Brother runs up and whiffs big, does some damage to Gub
Nishara runs to flanking and Fire Blasts!
Dao thinks, Phase Bolts
They have weak Will saves
Pandora Anthems and misses a Needle Darts
Gub misses a trip, and Crits the last Kvernknurr to death!
The water wheel is weird, and magical! The pile of bones continues to grow and feed the wheel, grinding them to paste. It follow the water flow The Singing pitches higher, as the Temple Shakes. Skeletons falling from the ceiling
"Like bones through the grinding wheel, so are the days of our lives."

We return to The Mermaid's Tears! Deniigi has figured out the bilastea.

Rituals:

A primary caster, a secondary caster
It's a downtime activity, or an exploration if it's less than 8h

Sailing Lore or Survival

One Hour Later
Dao primary caster Occultism +13, Pandora and Gub both +9 Survival

Gub succeeds! Pandora fails. Dao rolls well and succeeds!
Deniigi shouts that somethings coming, but Dao fists the ethereal Captain and finishes the ritual! The ship and all of us ghost-ify, the ship lifts above the ice, and we're off! The ship, unfettered, flies past the Jundland Wrecks. We've escaped!
"Finally, after hundreds of years, Pirate Captain Abney Tinhill sails again! The Mermaid's Tears sails again!"
We're headed to Giggidy, four or five days at most, at which the Captain will pass on! Capstan Swabby brings out ale!

Sarkorus: a land of many different things. A religious land, many gods and goddesses, beautiful land. Worldwould from Eruden's death, left a woulnd on reality. The Cult of Deskaren opened it even more. The city of Iz was torn open. We're headed to Mendev, the country nextdoor that got deviled-up when the Worldwould. Some Sarkorians survived, but the country was ruined.

In the morning, a sweet-smelling breeze brings a great thunderhead. Bad news and worse news!
A black sailed ship with a Chillaxian flag! and a Thunderstorm. 20 mins to prepare before being boarded, we hear screams of jabbering!
"Nishara! We'll get you, Nishara!"
