23. Pirate misses Pandora and can't Demoralize
24. Pirate strides twice out of boomerang and flanks Gub, doing some damage!
25. Dao gets a free Devise against the Red Dutchess, but she's not frightened!
26. Nishara recalls boomerang, and crits the pirate near her!
27. Gub tries to hit her, and she Eerie Flickers, except for her eyeball,
28. Dutchess and Bosun cut Gub Down with a buncha crits
29. Pandora rerolls a Soothe on Gub and moves
30. Pirate runs behind Dao and does some damage to Dao and misses Pandora

Dao gets a big crit! on the Boss and Pins her /w the Crit effect
Nishara goes off, and Air Slices into her! to death
She becomes cognizant of what's going on, and pulls the disgusting eyeball out of her head, veins and all, and throws it overboard. she asks to be burned, shrikes gratefully as she morphs out of shape like a Resident Evil
She says We'll Remember!

The Erutaki and Captain come out and we return to time
Sakuachi saw also our visions, but the Horned One was now being puppeted by something large in the distance.

A thundersnow storm! It worsens and worsens as we have to go below deck, which is now covered in ice! Once again vanilla and corpse sweat. The Storm wants us to remember something!
An endless barren o fsnow, and our compatriots, we're in a snow storm in an arctic wasteland, a force still obscured from our minds, we want it, we have to do it, our hands burn but we pull a sled and under a tarp, a massive humanoid figure clawed by chains, a palm mb of mountain apes drags with an akakaru, ahead a black pyramid, and in the distance Sakuachi, but then
back to the ship, and entitity forms on the deck! A humanoid of massive porportions! It wears our faces,

the storm is furious!
Moving at all requires an Acrobatics check!
All flames get extinguished!


Dao misses a stratagem but know this is a "Manifested Blizzard" from metals or psychic emanation, and Phase Bolts a miss
Pandora Anthems for 3 rounds and Needle Darts a miss /w the minus 2 boooo
Nishara Extracts Element on it! successfully, extracting wooder, strides easily and Flames it!
We see ourselves even more covered in black goo!
Creature Moves up, misses Gub, and misses Pandora
Gub trips, rages, and takes a big chunk and gets blinded in a backlash spray of ice!
Nishara melts most of it away!
It crits gub and eats a bunch of damage, then the persistent fire damage kills it!
Through the storm Sakuachi comes up and doesn't notice the body dissolve out of the ice creature


Captain Tinhill: Come down below deck for the rest of the storm. The Erutaki teach us some card games, and smirk to each other. Sakuachi looks deep in thought: she saw our visions with the horned one backed by some huge shape.
As we try to sleep, vanilla and corpse sweat, anohter memory: an instant move into this vision from dreams, trapped in these memories; a circle of black monoliths hundreds of feet tall, moonless, aurural lite, the sled from before is nowhere in sight! Sakujachi hest to the horned figure. Hundreds of figures spasm, yoy feel called through the lue icy depths below, you see your self like in the snow blizzard, held in place by slender boney spkder lehs. you plead for help, you need to be free of her
Sakuachi's scream wakes us, her mouth agape, she stares at a mass of dark clouds, shimmering and resolving into

Sakuachi says: Your punishment, made manifest!
The cloud bolts zooom to the ship an icy wind covers the ship in jagged ice

these things wearing our faces and speaking our voices! They're made of stars? When they move it's like a brush of reality moving

Doc says:
An evening of celebrations, a sweeping pirate set-piece, a psychic blizzard that got absolutely wrecked, and story exposition that Dao will remember as "that was odd" - 6 months is wild! But so many questions! Are those memories really yours? You'd never met before Ritalson united you all - how did you walk into a gate together on the night of the Missing Moment? Who is the "Her," the one your ice-imprisoned form claims you have to get away / escape from? What's the significance of bony white arms & fingers and a massive ape-thing with a symbol on its palm (exactly the same as Sakuachi)? Hmmm, have you ever seen an ape-like hand before, I wonder? If the ship captain ripped out the wriggling black mass, why did she still start mutating? Why the Horned One keep being so horn-y?
